posts.post_content:
I have hit a bit of a wall with regards to adding new items for my collection.

Here are some of the tobacco card catchers on the top of my want list:

B18 Steve ONeill (Purple and Yellow version)
S74 Chief Meyers (Colored Silks)
T205 Hick Cady
T3 Bill Bergen
T4 Obak Cabinets (Already have Berry and Tiedemann)
T205 Chief Meyers ( Cycle and Piedmont 42 backs)
T207 Brown Borders: Wingo
Old Mill Cabinet:  Clarence Munson
Plow Boy Tobacco Cabinet: Johnny Kling

Looking for nice creaseless examples. I can purchase outright or have items for trade as well.


Thanks,


Patrick
